entry.summary: Tap Protocol 已完成由 Sora Ventures 领投的 420 万美元融资。Tap Protocol 提供 Ordinals 的碎片化以及在 Ordinals 上实现去中心化金融应用程序。TAP 以 BRC-20 为基础，保留特定的代码长度（1、2 和 4 个字符），以实现 BRC-20 和 TAP 代币之间未来的互连。https://www.wublock123.com/index.php?m=content&c=index&a=show&catid=42&id=21721

entry.title: RT Mudit Gupta: The ledger issue is now fixed. To make sure you don't have the malicious library cached, go to https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@ledgerhq/...
entry.summary: RT Mudit Gupta The ledger issue is now fixed. To make sure you don't have the malicious library cached, go to https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@ledgerhq/connect-kit@1 and ensure the version is 1.1.8. If it's not, clear your cache. chrome- F12> Chrome Developer Tools > Application tab > Storage in left tree> Clear site data.

entry.summary:
RT REKTBuildr 🔺🔺🔺 Basically every single file on Ledger Live has user trackers in them I've cleaned a bunch and there's still 310 files Ledger REALLY wants to know what you're doing on Ledger Live. Every click, every keystroke, every thing you look at gets tracked, logged and phoned home to… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1732542258698694875
REKTBuildr 🔺🔺🔺: Cleaning user tracking code from Ledger Live code and JFC the whole thing is a gigantic user tracking system There's analytics trackers for nearly all events, on most screens. Ledger Live is a user data collection tool How is this system even accepted by the crypto community?
